description: TechGear Electronics is a leading online retailer specializing in premium electronics, smart home devices, and technology accessories. We pride ourselves on offering cutting-edge products with exceptional customer service.

support_hours.phone: Monday-Friday: 9:00 AM - 9:00 PM EST, Saturday-Sunday: 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM EST

returns.condition: Items must be in original packaging, unused, and in resalable condition
returns.restocking_fee: No restocking fee for standard returns
returns.exceptions: Opened software, personalized items, and final sale items are not returnable
returns.how_to_return: Initiate return request through your account or contact customer support

refunds.processing_time: 5-7 business days after receiving returned item
refunds.shipping_cost: Original shipping costs are non-refundable unless item was defective
refunds.partial_refunds: Available for damaged or missing parts without full return

warranty.extended_warranty: Optional 3-year or 5-year extended warranty available at purchase
warranty.coverage: Manufacturer defects, hardware failures (excludes physical damage, water damage, or misuse)
warranty.claim_process: Contact support with order number and description of issue

overnight_shipping.delivery_time: Next business day (order by 2 PM EST)

shipping.international_shipping: Available to Canada and select countries, calculated at checkout

price_matching.terms: We'll match any authorized retailer's price within 14 days of purchase
price_matching.exclusions: Marketplace sellers, auction sites, and unauthorized retailers excluded
price_matching.how_to_claim: Contact support with proof of lower price

order_cancellation.before_shipping: Can cancel anytime before order ships - full refund
order_cancellation.after_shipping: Cannot cancel, but can refuse delivery or initiate return
order_cancellation.processing_orders: Orders in 'Processing' status can usually be cancelled - contact support immediately

order_modification.address_change: Possible if order hasn't shipped yet
order_modification.item_change: Possible if order is in 'Processing' status - contact support
order_modification.shipping_upgrade: Available until order ships - price difference charged

payment_methods.security: All transactions secured with 256-bit SSL encryption
payment_methods.payment_plans: Interest-free payment plans available through Affirm on purchases over $500

free_account: Exclusive email deals and early access to sales

benefits: Early access to new product launches

values: Quality products from trusted brands only
Fast, reliable shipping and easy returns
Competitive pricing with price match guarantee
